title: Drawing, "View of Paris", 1867
medium: Pen and brown ink, graphite on brown paper
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite, at upper right: W H / Paris  1867.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view over Paris from a parapet of the tower of Notre Dame Cathedral in the foreground, where a man holds out a wishbone to entice a cat crouched on the extreme outer end of a gargoyle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View of Paris", 1867.
1867. Pen and brown ink, graphite on brown paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-58.
